content: As you approach the table, you can see that the parchment is old and yellowed with age. It appears to be a map, drawn in ink with intricate detail. The map shows a winding path through a dense forest, marked with various symbols and notations. There is a large X marked in the center of the map, indicating a location of importance. Along the edges of the parchment, there are handwritten notes in a language you don't recognize. The notes appear to be directions, but you can't make out the meaning without a translation.
